metadata.name: White paint
metadata.description:
Once upon a time, in a dull and gray school classroom, there was a white paint that stood out on the gray school board. It was a strange sight, as all the other colors had been used up and the board was left barren and gray. The white paint, unused and untouched, seemed to be calling out for someone to put it to good use.

One day, a student entered the room and was struck by the lonely white paint on the gray board. They approached the board and started to create a masterpiece with the white paint, their imagination running wild as they brought the board to life with bright and beautiful strokes.

As more students entered the room and saw what was being created, they too were inspired to join in and add their own unique touch to the piece. Soon the entire board was covered in a collage of bright colors and swirling designs, all starting from that one lonely white paint.

The gray board was transformed into a work of art, bringing joy and creativity to all who saw it. From that day on, the students never forgot the power of one small droplet of paint to change the world and bring happiness to those around them.
